actions.text: Amendment SA 2908 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2908 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 321.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(c) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2908.
Amendment SA 2908 proposed by Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2874.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2908 proposed by Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2874.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2908 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 321.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To protect Second Amendment rights, ensure that all individuals who should be prohibited from buying a firearm are listed in the National Instant Criminal Background Check System, and provide a responsible and consistent background check process.
